netport.unplug_cable_tips: First, please unplug the Ethernet cable that is plugged into the {silkprint}.
netport.wan_lan_change_tips: You can use the WAN port as a LAN port.
netport.reset_port_tips: You can restore {silkprint} to {port} mode by holding down the reset button of the device for 4 seconds.
netport.set_as_wan_tips: Once the {silkprint} is used as a WAN port
netport.as_wan_tips: {asWan}, the device connected to the port can't access the admin panel anymore. You'll have to connect it to Wi-Fi or other LAN ports.
netport.reset_as_lan_tips: Are you sure to restore the {silkprint} to LAN port (default)?
netport.set_as_lan_tips: Are you sure you want to switch {silkprint} to a LAN port?
netport.no_wan_tips: {silkprint} has been used as LAN (Local Area Network).You can set it back to WAN (Wide Area Network) in {view}
